main event: Observers watched a silver colored object moving silently in the sky, which descended and ascended rapidly before landing briefly and then taking off straight up.
interesting points: The object was described as silver colored and had revolving lights on its exterior,It moved at a constant speed but darted in different directions,The object alighted on the ground for about 15 seconds,It hovered after landing for approximately 15 minutes before moving off,The weather conditions at the time of observation were clear, allowing for a good view.
sighted object: one silver colored object with revolving lights
witness description: The report is sourced from civilian observers.
